verbs.description: It [V: must] have caused heartburn for many in the media when Donald Trump , the most " racist " president they know of , recently pardoned the first black heavyweight boxing champion , Jack Johnson . After President Barack Obama , with eight years in the White House , had refused to clear the late boxer 's name ! Jesse Washington , a writer for The Undefeated , helped the Left save face -- by
